nodes.text: Alyava Thomcro was a human female who worked as a vendor in the command center of the Galactic Republic's Tokare Garrison on Dantooine during the Dantooine Incursion.

Thomcro wore a white and black outfit that had silver plating above the shoulders and knees and on the wrists. The outfit had a white hood and black sleeves. She wore silver boots, with two spikes near the front on each one. She spoke Galactic Basic Standard.
Alyava Thomcro first appears in Update 5.10.3, released on June 4, 2019, for BioWare's 2011 massively multiplayer online roleplaying video game Star Wars: The Old Republic.
